title: How strong was Russia in WWI? - Quora

response.answer_text: Russian soldiers gave up, retreated, and the Czar opted out of the war. France wasn’t much better though. Germany would have won, until the US entered the war.

I must tell you uncomfortable truth: Russia won the WWI and we had been ready to parade in Berlin. The Victory'd lain two month ahead then had them Britain allies inspired the coup d'etat at February 1917. Russia lost, Germany lost - only France and GB won. The Russian Czar was too good to be a winner when his allies betrayed him.
